resources.string: The Department of Information Systems was founded in 1990 as part of the Münster School of Business and Economics (MSBE). More than 175 persons work at the department; there are seven professors, about 75 staff members and about 100 student assistants. Modern hardware and software facilities are available. The department is responsible for the Wirtschaftsinformatik bachelor program and the Information Systems master program in english language. Every year up to 100 students finish their studies to work in different sectors as consultants, software project managers, information managers, information system and organization designers etc. In application oriented research and development projects we connect business concepts with modern information and communication techniques to obtain holistic solutions. In cooperation with companies and associations we implement research results. The department provides consulting in designing of operational IT application and process organization.
The department is represented by the following professors:
Welcome to the Münster School of Business and Economics\n \n To navigate through the app, swipe in the main menu from the left or tap on the home icon.
